title: How to get the best of my Pixel's battery life?
content:
I am using a Pixel 4a and I love it except for the battery life. I don't use a lot of other features like the assistant, etc., that consume a lot of battery in general. Even with most of the power intensive features turned off, my pixel doesn't give me the best. The average SOT is 4 to 5 hours, sometimes < 4h. Can somebody tell me what I should do to increase the screen usage?

I don't let the battery percentage drop below 20% and qo usually charge it till it reaches 95 so that the SOT counter resets.

I've seen users boasting of 7h SOT. So, I would like to hear from you all.

Thanks,
Goqu.
